archimate:Requirement.name: BC.2.3.2: Organisations should verify that the information security elements of Business Continuity Planning (BCP), Disaster Recovery (DR) and Crisis Management (CM) plans and arrangements are effective by:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
